overview:
Fabrice Sergent is the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Cellfish. He is a media and Internet entrepreneur, based in New York. He is also Chair of the Advisory Board for the Mobile Giving Foundation, for which Cellfish provides the technology platform in order to process mobile-giving transactions.

Prior to founding Cellfish in 2004, Sergent was CEO of Lagardère Active Broadband, the digital arm of Lagardère, a French-based media publisher. In addition, he was a member of the Executive Committee of Europe 1 Communication, which became Lagardère Active.

From 1994 to 2001, Sergent was Founder, Chairman & CEO of Club-Internet, one of the largest French ISPs, which later was purchased by Deutsche Telecom’s T-Online for an historical 1.2 B€ transaction, a landmark deal in the European new media space for its time.
